attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I bought this app to genuinely support MY president. Unfortunately even I can admit this app is horrible. The minute I opened it it crashed, not a good start. THEN once i got into the app it was very laggy and glitchy. If i tapped one article it either would freeze and not open or open a whole different one. The whole app consistently crashed as well. To make matters worse my phone had gotten soooo much slower after downloading, I am sure itâ€™s correlated. After deleting the Trump app everything went back to normal. In addition to the software issues; I saw multiple examples of completely inaccurate, un-cited information. I appreciate that my president is trying to keep me updated, but lots of it is blatantly false? Lastly, the way the app is set up is TERRIBLE, very hard to navigate and hard to read due to the text size. It really doesnâ€™t deserve the one star even to be honest.
